title: malaiyadhE manamE
sahitya:
malaiyAdE manamE vINE nI



anupallavi



malaiyadu vizhinum tan talaiyAlE tAngavE talaivan arumukhavan ilaiyA



caraNam



mAn marugan vEl murugan vana sarasAngi maNavALan tAn vara kavi

kunjaradAsanum sarasAngi maNavALan undanaiyE ennAlum nangALum
